mapper.select: SELECT notice_id, title, content, writer, reg_date, view_count, important FROM ( SELECT rownum rank, a.* FROM ( SELECT notice_id, title, content, writer, reg_date, view_count, important FROM b_user_notice_tbl ORDER BY CASE WHEN important = 'Y' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, reg_date DESC ) a ) WHERE rank > #{start} AND rank < #{end}
SELECT notice_id, title, content, writer, reg_date, view_count, important FROM b_user_notice_tbl WHERE notice_id = #{notice_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_user_notice_tbl ( notice_id, title, content, writer, reg_date, view_count, important ) VALUES ( user_notice_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, SYSDATE, 0, #{important, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT notice_id, title, content, writer, reg_date, view_count, important FROM b_owner_notice_tbl ORDER BY CASE WHEN important = 'Y' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, reg_date DESC
SELECT notice_id, title, content, writer, reg_date, view_count, important FROM b_owner_notice_tbl WHERE notice_id = #{notice_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_owner_notice_tbl ( notice_id, title, content, writer, reg_date, view_count, important ) VALUES ( owner_notice_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, SYSDATE, 0, #{important, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
